messages.message:
Hey Team, been playing around with Chatbots (love the functionality and additions on this!). I have a couple of small feedback points I wanted to raise though.

There is some inconsistency with the 'Edit Chatbot' buttons. The one in the sidebar takes you to the edit chatbot details screen, where as the one at the top takes you back to your original Converse project. Loom here (https://www.loom.com/share/798f08d4e9db416cb328a15f11b5e5e6?sid=41dbd93b-4e36-4fe9-9ed6-1218f2db636e)

We'll need to change the label of the buttons so the label matches the action.
Updating the side panel option to say `Edit chatbot details` should do (or update the top one to say something like `Edit chatbot files`)
cc @Subash

Rather than updating the side panel to `Edit Chatbot Details`, could we update it to `Edit App` and have it take you back to the original converse project? This will align more cleanly with the expectations we set for Doc Apps where there is an `Edit App` button in the sidepanel which takes you back to the Build project
